AboutPage.title: About Simpul Academy
AboutPage.description: Get to know us better, how we work, and the values we hold dear.
AboutPage.history_title: Started from a Coffee Shop in Aceh
AboutPage.history_p1: CV Simpul Project Academy was born from the warm discussions of young professionals in various coffee shops in Aceh. We, who come from diverse backgrounds but share the same vision, saw a major challenge faced by students and academics: the difficulty in breaking into the world of scientific publication.
AboutPage.history_p2: From casual chats, the idea emerged to build a platform that could bridge this gap. We wanted to create a 'node' (simpul) that connects brilliant research ideas with credible publication platforms. So, in 2024, we formalized our steps into a business entity.
AboutPage.history_p3: Now, Simpul Academy continues to grow, driven by a spirit of collaboration and a commitment to improving the quality and quantity of scientific publications from Indonesia.
AboutPage.vision_text: To be the leading academic partner that empowers Indonesian scholars to produce globally reputable scientific work and make a real impact on society.
AboutPage.mission_item1: Provide integrated, professional, and trustworthy publication assistance services.
AboutPage.mission_item2: Improve the quality of scientific manuscripts through international standard proofreading and editing services.
AboutPage.mission_item3: Organize innovative and applicable academic writing training and workshops.
AboutPage.mission_item4: Build a strong collaboration network between academics, researchers, and educational institutions.
